overview: The film tells the story of a married woman named "Rihanna" seeks to overcome the problem of the loss of memory of her husband Ramzi, who is just returning from the traditional Maristan "Boya Omar", by charging his memory with a set of data that adapts to the new situation and restore his identity, but fails to do so because of the resistance of Ramzi character Outs to interact with the new context.
title: فورماطاج
